mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, category_id, nature, price, stock, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{nature,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stock,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=OTHER}, nature = #{nature,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIME}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIME}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
mapper.select: select id, name, category_id, nature, price, stock, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted from product where id = #{id,jdbcType=OTHER}
select id, name, category_id, nature, price, stock, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted from product
